languageKey.label: SAV JpGraph > Marker
Marker object
<marker [attribute]> ... </marker>
Creates a marker object.

Creates a marker object. Attribute: . id="myMarker". Optional attribute but it is requested when using reference to this object. The reference will be "myMarker".
The following tags are allowed inside the marker tag
<setMarker attribute />
Defines the marker. Attribute: . value="Number of pages created per year".
